title: Executive Order 6886-Transfer of Lands From the Nicolet National Forest to the Chequanegon National Forest
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of June 4, 1897 (30 Stat. 11, 36, U.S.C., title 16, sec. 473), and on the recommendation of the Secretary of Agriculture, it is ordered that the Mondeaux unit of the Nicolet National Forest, as defined by Proclamation No. 2060, of November 13, 1933, be, and it is hereby, transferred to the Chequanegon National Forest, as defined by Proclamation No. 2061, of November 13, 1933.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6886-Transfer of Lands From the Nicolet National Forest to the Chequanegon National Forest Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/373421
